name.ja: <ruby>分<rt>ぶん</rt></ruby><ruby>裂<rt>れつ</rt></ruby>するマザー・スパイダー

text.en: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Tribute this card; you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters, also Special Summon up to 3 "Baby Spider" from your hand and/or Deck, and if you do, their Levels become 5, also they cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon, except the Xyz Summon of a DARK monster. You can only use this effect of "Fissioning Mother Spider" once per turn.
